title: The Architect of Shadows
goal: Solidify the evidence against Valerius, confirming his direct connection to the blight's spread and establishing him as a clear antagonist.
stakes_shift: The group now has a clear, powerful human antagonist to contend with, complicating their mission and shifting the conflict from an abstract evil to a tangible, political foe.

bridge.from_prev: The group has strong suspicions about Lord Valerius's involvement with the blight.
bridge.to_next: The group commits to a dangerous course of action against Valerius, solidifying their alliance for the impending conflict.

sections.title: Forbidden Knowledge
sections.intent: Seraphina finds undeniable proof of Valerius's involvement with the blight.

scenes.summary: Seraphina uncovers a hidden chamber in her archive, revealing Valerius's personal journals detailing his experiments with the blight.
scenes.outcome: Seraphina discovers irrefutable proof of Valerius's active involvement in cultivating and spreading the Shadow Blight.

sections.title: A Lord's Treachery
sections.intent: The group confronts the reality of Valerius's betrayal and the depth of his corruption.

scenes.summary: The group pores over Valerius's journals, realizing his 'benevolence' is a facade for a sinister plan to harness the blight's power.
scenes.outcome: The group fully comprehends the extent of Valerius's treachery and his intent to weaponize the blight.

sections.title: The Enemy Unmasked
sections.intent: The group formally identifies Valerius as their primary antagonist, shifting their focus.

scenes.summary: With Valerius's true nature exposed, the group recognizes him as a direct, powerful enemy, shifting their focus from investigation to action.
scenes.outcome: Valerius is definitively identified as the primary antagonist, unifying the group against him.
